author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
A policeman was killed here on Thursday afternoon, after a gun went off inside a bank.

According to a Srinagar-based police spokesman, bank guard Altaf Ahmad Lala, a resident of Eidgah, Srinagar, was injured when the rifle of another guard Javed Ahmad Dar was accidentally fired at a J&K Bank branch in Srinagar.
title: Policeman killed
